Oglasile se i Delije: Nemojte da se brukamo zbog kiše
„Ovo je sever, ovo je Marakana“, poručuje se o saopštenju Delija

05 Nov 2019

Skupi paketi karata za Ligu šampiona doprineli su da se uoči duela Crvene zvezde ne traži karta više. Protiv Olimpijakosa Marakana nije bila puna, a pitanje je da li će se to desiti i sutra kada na najvećem srpskom stadionu gostuje Totenhem.



I pored toga očekuje se standardni spektakl u režiji Delija, kao i koreografija na severnoj tribini. Upravo zbog toga soapštenjem se oglasila i navijačka grupa Delije sever.„Ne događaju se čuda često, ali se događaju! Svaki igrač koji kroči prvi put na naš stadion, sigurno to nigde nije doživeo! Marakana je mesto gde novac nema tu težinu kao na drugim stadionima, a to je baš zbog te energije koju naš stadion ima. Zato je sutra iskoristimo do maksimuma! Za sutra se najavljuje kiša. Nemojte da se brukamo kao dosta puta do sad da se ljudi nabijaju pod krov pa da nam tribina izgleda polu prazna. Takođe, koreografija mora da se podigne i to je tek dupli razlog da sever bude pun od prvog do 90. minuta, a ne da pod krovom bude duplo više ljudi nego u donjim redovima. Ovo je sever, ovo je Marakana... neka osete to sutra i igrači Totenhema!“, piše u saopštenju Delija.

Delia also responded: Don't worry about the rain
"This is north, this is Marakana," Delia said in a statement

05 Nov 2019

Expensive packs of cards for the Champions League have made it a no-brainer to look for a ticket before the Red Star duel. Marakana's Olympiakos was not full, and the question is whether it will happen tomorrow when Tottenham is hosting Serbia's biggest stadium.



Even so, the standard spectacle directed by Delhi is expected, as well as the choreography on the northern stand. That's why the Delia North fan group made the announcement. "Miracles don't happen often, but they happen! Every player who walks into our stadium for the first time has certainly never experienced it! Maracana is a place where money does not have that weight as in other stadiums, and that is precisely because of the energy that our stadium has. So let's make the most of it tomorrow! Rain is announced for tomorrow. Do not be confused as many times so far that people are piled under the roof so that the panel looks half empty. Also, the choreography needs to be raised, and this is only a double reason for the north to be full from the first to the 90th minute, and not to have twice as many people under the roof than in the lower rows. This is the north, this is Marakana ... let the players of Tottenham feel it tomorrow! "
